entry.title: Finally I Decided to Blog
entry.content:
Every time I was reading some professional hackers blogs, I talked by myself how is it good if I had my own blog and through that I could stream my thoughts to the world.

Today I am so happy and proud because finally I decided to create my own weblog.

I hope I do my best to make great posts onward.

I believe in this:

Do the difficult things while they are easy and do the great things while they are small. A journey of a thousand miles must begin with a single step.

Lao Tzu
